classification_reason: As Follow-Up & Technical Support Manager at Telecom Egypt (10K-50K employees), Richard Hanna directly manages technical support operations where ticket handling, resolution processes, and team performance are core responsibilities. His role inherently involves addressing operational chaos in support workflows, managing agent teams, and improving technical support processes - all central to ResolveOnce's target pain points of incomplete ticket closures, knowledge loss from turnover, and ticket bouncing. His managerial position indicates decision-making authority for support tools and processes.

name: Rolland Colón
classification_reason: Strong match across all criteria: As IT/Service Desk Manager at InMarket, he leads day-to-day operations of IT Department and Service Desk, manages IT support staff, defines ITSM processes to meet SLA targets, develops ticketing metrics and dashboards for KPIs, provides technical support to 350+ remote users, and built/maintains internal Knowledge Base to reduce support ticket volume. His role involves managing operational chaos through process improvement, knowledge management, and team leadership. Company size (350+ users) fits target range, and he has clear decision-making authority for tools/processes with 15+ years of progressive IT/support experience.

talking_points: 15+ years of IT experience supporting large enterprise environments
Management of IT Service Desk operations and SLA targets
Experience with SOC 2 Type I & II and ISO 27001 certifications

IT Asset Management and endpoint protection
Building internal Knowledge Bases to reduce support ticket volume
Experience with 24/7 critical issue response coordination
Background in training and mentoring IT support staff
pain_points: Managing 350+ remote users across multiple platforms (Mac, Windows, Linux)
Meeting or exceeding SLA targets for 24/7 support operations
IT Asset Management and procurement for distributed workforce
Security compliance and quarterly access reviews
Reducing support ticket volume through self-service solutions
Coordinating with security team on endpoint protection and firewall configuration
Managing multiple SaaS platforms and access control
analysis.outreach_approach: Focus on how your solution can streamline IT service desk operations, improve SLA compliance, and reduce administrative overhead. Emphasize features that help manage remote users, automate asset management, and simplify security compliance. Position as a strategic partner for IT leaders managing complex multi-platform environments.
personalization: Reference his specific experience with SOC 2 and ISO 27001 certifications
Mention his work with Google Workspace and JumpCloud administration
Note his focus on building internal knowledge bases for self-service
Acknowledge his player-coach management style and training background

## About

IT Service Desk Manager at InMarket Media in Los Angeles California  
  
I have experience in both technical and management roles with an extensive IT background and over 15 years of hands-on experience supporting large enterprise corporate environments that include large data centers as well as 24/7/365 desktop/remote Support Teams  
  
Offer a broad skill set which includes; Management, IAM/Access Control, Systems Administration, SOC2 & ISO27001, A+ /Net+ remote support certifications, outstanding organizational abilities, excellent communication skills, and the ability to adapt quickly and multi-task in a multi-job environment.  
  
Detail oriented, able to interact and convey complex technical issues/ideas effectively with people at all levels of the organization. I am also able to patiently explain the “how” and “why” to those who are less technically inclined with compassion and a smile.  
  
Dynamic leader, trainer, and motivator with a player coach management style.  
  
Project credibility and confidence when speaking and offer information in understandable terms.  
  
Reliable, enthusiastic, and passionate about helping individuals work through their technical issues.

## About

A driven technical support manager, aiming to contribute to the success and improvement of a company. Highly skilled in handling common and complex business and technical disputes, as well as routing internal processes and procedures. Motivated to provide solutions and coordinate projects in the best interest of the company. An avid team builder, and developer of leaders, with an appreciation for teamwork and encouragement. A responsible and reliable employee, and a great addition to any team. Experienced in HPE Nimble Storage, NCV, AWS, AZURE, and GCP storage integrations, as well as the HPE Greenlake and Data Services Cloud Console. Worked with various other storage platforms such as Fas20XX filers, Data ONTAP, SAN, NAS, VMware, and Microsoft technologies. Skilled in network management, switches and routers, troubleshooting, Storage solutions, RAID services, and Network security. Experienced in server and storage architecture, implementation, and management.

Unlike our previous users who might check in periodically, these reps are on the platform constantly — making even a small change can be really impactful for their day to day.   Solomon walks through Unify for Sales Reps and his user experience philosophy in the video below.

    *   [Report this post](https://www.linkedin.com/uas/login?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Fposts%2Fsuad-ozgun-b4212566_leadership-growth-gratitude-activity-7351297624190115843-jeVG&trk=public_profile__posts_ellipsis-menu-semaphore-sign-in-redirect&guestReportContentType=POST&_f=guest-reporting)
    
    [Suad Ozgun posted this](https://www.linkedin.com/posts/suad-ozgun-b4212566_leadership-growth-gratitude-activity-7351297624190115843-jeVG)
    
    7 years. Not just a number but a collection of lessons, pivots, stretch moments, and quiet wins that shaped how I work, lead, and think. It’s no longer about the number of projects, calls, or campaigns. It’s about what we learn and build together. Instead, I count: 🔹 The times I said “I don’t know” and then learned 🔹 The moments I helped someone grow, even just a little 🔹 The decisions I made with imperfect data, but clear intent 🔹 The balance I tried to keep between ambition and empathy This past year brought new responsibilities, unfamiliar territory, and higher expectations not just from others, but from myself. I’m proud of the work I’ve done. But even more, I’m proud of who I’ve become doing it. Grateful for the people who challenged me with trust, feedback, and kindness. Excited (and a little nervous) about what’s next. That’s how I know I’m still growing. Special thanks to the mentors and leaders who shaped this journey for giving me direction, ownership, and space to grow. [Serhat Soyuerel](https://www.linkedin.com/in/serhat-soyuerel?trk=public_profile__posts-text) [Arda Koterin](https://tr.linkedin.com/in/ardakoterin?trk=public_profile__posts-text) [Hande Cilingir](https://www.linkedin.com/in/hande-cilingir?trk=public_profile__posts-text) [Meyar Sheik](https://www.linkedin.com/in/meyar-sheik-86042b?trk=public_profile__posts-text) [Moritz Nikolaus Wolff](https://de.linkedin.com/in/moritzwolff?trk=public_profile__posts-text) [Kerem Bozokluoğlu](https://tr.linkedin.com/in/kerem-bozokluoglu?trk=public_profile__posts-text) To the incredible teammates I’ve worked closely with across Customer Success, Account Development, Onboarding, and Sales.     🚀 Exciting News for AI Innovators! 🚀 [Y Combinator](https://www.linkedin.com/school/y-combinator/?trk=public_profile__posts-text) is hosting its first-ever AI Startup School on June 16-17 in San Francisco, bringing together some of the biggest names in AI—Elon Musk, [Satya Nadella](https://www.linkedin.com/in/satyanadella?trk=public_profile__posts-text), Sam Altman, [Andrew Ng](https://www.linkedin.com/in/andrewyng?trk=public_profile__posts-text), and more. At Insider, we’re passionate about empowering the next generation of AI builders. That’s why we’re offering fully funded scholarships to help top AI talent from the United States attend this transformative event. Our scholarship covers all travel and living expenses, making sure nothing stands in the way of those ready to shape the future of AI. 🔹 If you’ve been accepted but need financial support to make the trip happen, reach out to us at [y-combinator@useinsider.com](mailto:y-combinator@useinsider.com?trk=public_profile__posts-text) to apply for an Insider Scholarship. 📌 Apply here: [https://lnkd.in/edeFVk6Y](https://lnkd.in/edeFVk6Y?trk=public_profile__posts-text) Thinking back to the early days of our journey, when we were just starting out with big dreams and limited resources, makes this even more meaningful. Now, alongside [Serhat Soyuerel](https://www.linkedin.com/in/serhat-soyuerel?trk=public_profile__posts-text) and our team, we have the chance to support the next wave of AI innovators—just like we once needed support ourselves. Let’s build the future, together! 💡🚀 \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_ 🚀 Yapay Zekâ Girişimcileri için Harika Haberler! 🚀 [Y Combinator](https://www.linkedin.com/school/y-combinator/?trk=public_profile__posts-text), 16-17 Haziran tarihlerinde San Francisco’da ilk AI Startup School etkinliğini düzenliyor. Bursumuz, tüm seyahat ve konaklama masraflarını karşılıyor—böylece geleceği şekillendirmek isteyenler için hiçbir engel kalmıyor. 🔹 Eğer kabul aldıysanız ancak etkinliğe katılmak için finansal desteğe ihtiyacınız varsa, [y-combinator@useinsider.com](mailto:y-combinator@useinsider.com?trk=public_profile__posts-text) adresinden Insider Bursu için başvurabilirsiniz. 📌 Başvuru linki: [https://lnkd.in/edeFVk6Y](https://lnkd.in/edeFVk6Y?trk=public_profile__posts-text) Bundan yıllar önce, büyük hayallerle fakat sınırlı imkânlarla yola çıktığımız günleri hatırlamak, bu anı daha da anlamlı kılıyor. Bugün, [Serhat Soyuerel](https://www.linkedin.com/in/serhat-soyuerel?trk=public_profile__posts-text) ve ekibimizle birlikte, yeni nesil yapay zekâ girişimcilerine destek olma şansına sahibiz—tıpkı bir zamanlar bizim de desteğe ihtiyaç duyduğumuz gibi.     True disruption and reinvention don’t just happen—they’re built, step by step. With this funding, we’re set to elevate our vision for AI and GenAI-powered customer experiences and engagement to the next level. Up until today, [Insider.](https://www.linkedin.com/company/useinsider?trk=public_profile__posts-text) has disrupted the industry in two prominent ways. 1. From our earliest days, we built a compound SaaS platform. Unlike traditional companies that focused on a single area or product, our approach was different. We built multiple industry-leading solutions that outperform single-point solutions and other vendors in every way. 2. Insider has been a leader in AI for more than a decade. We were one of the first players in the market to combine predictive AI models with customer experience technologies. We were in a prime position to incorporate [#GenerativeAI](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Ffeed%2Fhashtag%2Fgenerativeai&trk=public_profile__posts-text) natively within our platform. We are on the brink of an AI era that will truly disrupt the MarTech industry, and Insider will be the disruptive force leading it. Today, we disrupt the industry again, by securing the single largest funding round received by a woman-founded MarTech unicorn in history. As a company born in Europe, we expanded across more than 28 regions. Today, we power the customer experience for iconic brands across North America, Europe, Asia, MENA, and Latin America. We have so much more ahead of us. Let the new chapter begin… Find out more about the news here:  [https://bit.ly/3YJg9OX](https://bit.ly/3YJg9OX?trk=public_profile__posts-text) Become a part of the journey.     Six years at [Insider.](https://www.linkedin.com/company/useinsider?trk=public_profile__posts-text) feels like a blink of an eye. This milestone is a testament to an incredible journey filled with growth and unforgettable experiences. From the very beginning, Insider's dynamic and innovative environment has been a driving force. Collaborating with brilliant minds, all sharing a common goal, has been nothing short of inspiring. We've broken barriers, tackled challenges head-on, and celebrated remarkable achievements together. One memory that stands out is when we successfully launched a major project in a new market, expanding our footprint into [#LATAM](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Ffeed%2Fhashtag%2Flatam&trk=public_profile__posts-text). The teamwork and dedication shown by everyone involved were truly remarkable. Another unforgettable moment was our expansion into [#NORTHAMERICA](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Ffeed%2Fhashtag%2Fnorthamerica&trk=public_profile__posts-text), where we faced and overcame significant challenges, solidifying our presence and achieving impressive results. In these six years, I’ve worked in 3 different countries, with 5 different leaders, in 6 different roles, with over 250 clients, 750 business contacts, and more than 1500 colleagues. These numbers are hard to justify, but that’s what makes them so special. I am especially grateful to [Serhat Soyuerel](https://www.linkedin.com/in/serhat-soyuerel?trk=public_profile__posts-text), [Arda Koterin](https://tr.linkedin.com/in/ardakoterin?trk=public_profile__posts-text), [Hande Cilingir](https://www.linkedin.com/in/hande-cilingir?trk=public_profile__posts-text), [Meyar Sheik](https://www.linkedin.com/in/meyar-sheik-86042b?trk=public_profile__posts-text), [Moritz Nikolaus Wolff](https://de.linkedin.com/in/moritzwolff?trk=public_profile__posts-text), [Kerem Bozokluoğlu](https://tr.linkedin.com/in/kerem-bozokluoglu?trk=public_profile__posts-text) who have been a constant source of support and guidance.     [Suad Ozgun reacted on this](https://www.linkedin.com/posts/lauren-ec-donahue_1-year-365-days-duh-i-cant-believe-i-activity-7381486677128744960-WBcn)
    
    1 year. 365 days (duh). I can’t believe I’ve already reached this milestone with [Insider.](https://www.linkedin.com/company/useinsider?trk=public_profile__reactions-text) This stage of my professional career feels different. I’ve always had a passion for intentionality in my professional career. Lately, I’ve been emboldened with a sense of heightened awareness, within myself and the teams I’m a part of. This organization has allowed me to exist in a space where I can feel discomfort, express it, and be heard and appreciated. When I first started here, I was hoping it would uphold the expectation I had set for it to be a place where ideas are appreciated and people are effectively collaborating toward a common goal. This team and organization have exceeded those expectations in ways I couldn’t have predicted. I’ve grown in ways equally unimaginable. One of the few commonalities we all share is imperfection. It is only through recognition of our imperfections we are able to grow and evolve for the better. This is the mindset I’ve adopted over the last year, but I’ll accept there is still room for more growth. I’m just excited to see what it brings. Here’s to year 2 and those to come.     🚀Exciting Career Update 🚀 Thrilled to share that I’m embarking on a new chapter in my professional journey by joining the US Enterprise Sales Team at [Insider.](https://www.linkedin.com/company/useinsider?trk=public_profile__reactions-text)! After wrapping up my second chapter and a joined total of almost 8 years at [Sprout Social, Inc.](https://www.linkedin.com/company/sprout-social-inc-?trk=public_profile__reactions-text), I take this next step feeling deeply grateful for the experiences, leadership, and support that helped shape so much of my career. A huge thank you to [Seth Hines](https://www.linkedin.com/in/seth-hines-8869b11a?trk=public_profile__reactions-text), [Matthew O'Neal](https://www.linkedin.com/in/matthewboneal?trk=public_profile__reactions-text), [Ryan Barretto](https://www.linkedin.com/in/ryanbarretto?trk=public_profile__reactions-text), [Jason Calvin](https://ca.linkedin.com/in/jasoncalvin?trk=public_profile__reactions-text), [Vladlena Milicenco](https://ca.linkedin.com/in/vladlena-milicenco-b86a9151?trk=public_profile__reactions-text) and to the whole team at Sprout Social for all the moments that have made this journey so special. Now, I'm taking on a new challenge at [Insider.](https://www.linkedin.com/company/useinsider?trk=public_profile__reactions-text), an innovator and leader in AI-powered customer engagement. What excites me about this new chapter is the opportunity to make an impact on a growing US Team who is redefining how businesses leverage AI-powered growth and real-time customer experiences. Huge thanks to [Arjun A. Kumar](https://www.linkedin.com/in/arjun-a-kumar-98268958?trk=public_profile__reactions-text), [Meyar Sheik](https://www.linkedin.com/in/meyar-sheik-86042b?trk=public_profile__reactions-text), [Serhat Soyuerel](https://www.linkedin.com/in/serhat-soyuerel?trk=public_profile__reactions-text) & [Belis Dokumacı](https://tr.linkedin.com/in/belis-dokumaci?trk=public_profile__reactions-text) for making the onboarding process engaging, informative and fun! Very excited to be part of the team, and looking forward to all that lies ahead! 🚀

    I'm excited to have started a new role as VP of Product Marketing at [MoEngage](https://www.linkedin.com/company/moengage?trk=public_profile__reactions-text)! Having been in this space for a while now, what really stood out to me about MoEngage was its vision to be the most trusted Customer Engagement Platform for customer-obsessed brands. After being with the company for some time, I've realized it's not just a mission statement, but a blueprint that guides every action and decision across our teams. I have always been a builder at heart, and the thoughtful product innovation and pace at which MoEngage builds were a huge draw for me. From building a warehouse-native approach to personalization, to rapidly advancing generative agents for marketers, to launching AI Decisioning—we move fast, yet stay intentional about creating real impact for brands. For product marketers, that means we’re constantly racing to keep up with all the cool things our product and engineering teams are building (a great problem to have!). A big thank you to [Raviteja Dodda](https://www.linkedin.com/in/rteja?trk=public_profile__reactions-text), [Yashwanth Kumar](https://in.linkedin.com/in/yakumar?trk=public_profile__reactions-text), [Yash Reddy](https://uk.linkedin.com/in/yashreddy7?trk=public_profile__reactions-text), [Nalin Goel](https://in.linkedin.com/in/nalingoel?trk=public_profile__reactions-text), [Narasimha Reddy](https://in.linkedin.com/in/narasimhareddyiv?trk=public_profile__reactions-text), [Veena Satish](https://in.linkedin.com/in/veenasatish?trk=public_profile__reactions-text), and the other leaders at MoEngage for bringing me on this fantastic ride. I couldn't have asked for a better team to kick things off and am enjoying every conversation, idea, and project with [Ganesh Srinivasan](https://in.linkedin.com/in/ganesh-srini?trk=public_profile__reactions-text), [Suraj Dubey](https://in.linkedin.com/in/surajdubey23?trk=public_profile__reactions-text), [Kirtana Suri](https://in.linkedin.com/in/kirtanasuri?trk=public_profile__reactions-text), [Zaid Assadi](https://in.linkedin.com/in/zaid-assadi-01?trk=public_profile__reactions-text), Sandeep Madala, [Prateek K.](https://in.linkedin.com/in/prateek-k-00827b75?trk=public_profile__reactions-text), [Faraaz Peerbhai](https://in.linkedin.com/in/faraaz-peerbhai?trk=public_profile__reactions-text), and so many more folks on the team! Here’s to a new chapter! 🚀

Application Developer, Database Administrator, and Project Manager in a wide variety of business applications. ## About

I have been working as a Product Development & Presentation Manager Denim/Garments industry since last 13 years. Interested in the field of Product Development & Presentation. Every 4 months visit in ITALY for workshop or training on Sustainable Product for Denims conducted in Italy. the main Idea was to get awareness and have latest themes to meet the environmental affected workout.  
Upcoming new fashion, Themes, Stories to plan as program to set a range of verities of Products that like by may which brings the trends turn may to like denim more.  
  
I have spent many time as a Product Development & Presentation Manager. Fully awareness of Product development Depart, operations and their feasibility which include cost estimation ,plant erection, material and energy balance. .  
I develop myself as a Consultant of Product Development specially for denim/Garments Cutting, Stitching, Dry process (knowledge by hand), Wet process (knowledge by hand) and finishing operations , Having keen interest to resolve trouble issue related to Cutting, Stitching, Dry process, and Washing (wet process) and finishing stage.  
  
Specialties: - Expertise in Cutting, Stitching, Art work (Dry Process(By hand) and Wet Process (by hand) Product and Development and wet process operation. including sampling,cost estimation material balance ,chemical Costing and R&D specialist.

*   ### [Cloud security shoot-out: AWS vs Azure](https://www.linkedin.com/redir/redirect?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww%2Eitnews%2Ecom%2Eau%2FLab%2F353268%2Ccloud-security-shoot-out-aws-vs-azure%2Easpx&urlhash=Owcd&trk=public_profile_publication-title "Cloud security shoot-out: AWS vs Azure")
    
    #### ITNews January 6, 2013
    
    In survey after survey, IT managers nominate ‘security’ as one of the prime reasons they are tentative about embracing public cloud servers.  
    Two of the most common security concerns for users of public cloud storage include data confidentiality and data integrity.  
    Microsoft Azure is addressing cloud security using virtual private storage based on Searchable Encryption. Amazon Web Services has also responded with its own tools.

    In survey after survey, IT managers nominate ‘security’ as one of the prime reasons they are tentative about embracing public cloud servers.  
    Two of the most common security concerns for users of public cloud storage include data confidentiality and data integrity.  
    Microsoft Azure is addressing cloud security using virtual private storage based on Searchable Encryption. Amazon Web Services has also responded with its own tools.  
    We compare the architecture level security and the application level security of the two from a theoretical perspective. Both these cloud service providers include significant provisions for dealing with cloud security issues – but one offers a clear differentiator.  
    Show less
    
    [See publication](https://www.linkedin.com/redir/redirect?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww%2Eitnews%2Ecom%2Eau%2FLab%2F353268%2Ccloud-security-shoot-out-aws-vs-azure%2Easpx&urlhash=Owcd&trk=public_profile_publication-button "Cloud security shoot-out: AWS vs Azure") 
    
*   ### Microsoft and Amazon, A comparison of approaches to cloud security
    
    #### October 12, 2012
    
    Research has shown that data security has always been an important aspect of quality of service for data service providers; but cloud computing poses new and challenging security threats. The most common security concerns for users of cloud storage are data confidentiality, integrity and availability. Microsoft has considered these concerns and responded with the Azure virtual private storage based on Searchable Encryption. Amazon has also responded to these security issues with its Amazon Web… Show more
    
    Research has shown that data security has always been an important aspect of quality of service for data service providers; but cloud computing poses new and challenging security threats. The most common security concerns for users of cloud storage are data confidentiality, integrity and availability. Microsoft has considered these concerns and responded with the Azure virtual private storage based on Searchable Encryption. Amazon has also responded to these security issues with its Amazon Web Services. In this paper, we investigate and compare in depth the features of Microsoft Azure and Amazon Web Services deemed to provide security with a particular focus on confidentiality, integrity and availability of data. Show less

classification_reason: Profile shows technical sales and support for scientific/industrial equipment (Malvern Panalytical products) rather than IT/customer support operations. Current role is Sector Sales Manager focused on sales and customer services for industrial sectors (cement, mining, minerals, etc.). No evidence of managing support teams, handling ticket systems, or dealing with the operational chaos described in the target ICP. Company size and industry context don't align with B2B/SaaS support operations.

talking_points: Customer success leadership and post-sales expertise
Experience driving customer and employee satisfaction
Background in B2B SaaS environment at Connectbase
Strong community involvement in youth sports coaching
Educational background from Bryant University
Extensive professional network with 2K+ followers and 500+ connections
pain_points: Managing customer success metrics and retention in competitive SaaS market
Scaling customer success operations as company grows
Balancing post-sales support with proactive customer engagement
Team management and employee satisfaction in remote/hybrid environments
Driving customer adoption and reducing churn rates
Integrating customer feedback into product development cycles
analysis.outreach_approach: Start with a value-driven email focusing on customer success best practices, referencing his role at Connectbase and shared industry challenges. Position your solution as complementary to his customer satisfaction goals. Follow up with a LinkedIn connection request mentioning mutual interests in customer success leadership.
personalization: Reference his VP of Customer Success role at Connectbase specifically
Mention his focus on driving customer and employee satisfaction from his LinkedIn about section
Note his extensive coaching background in youth sports as a leadership parallel
Connect to the Greater Boston area location
Acknowledge his Bryant University education if relevant to your solution

## About

Polypropylene Technical Representative with seven years of experience in polymerization, additivation and extrusion of polyolefins.  
  
With experience in the operation of ZSK-170 and ZSK-350 Coperion Extruders for Polypropylene Resins, also designed the screw configuration for the ZSK-350 for Polypropylene.  
  
Right now providing technical assessment in polypropylene and its final applications.

## About

Hello World!  
  
Meet a passionate and astute researcher with interests in drug discovery and computational Chemistry.  
  
I'm also passionate about clinical research, Pharmacovigilance and Rational Medicine Use and direct application of findings to patient management  
  
I have a knack for writing and editing in vast areas of topics

## About

Strategic marketing and employer branding leader with over a decade of management experience and a strong track record of working cross-functionally across organizations, including global teams and complex matrix structures. I specialize in leading strategic processes that connect brand, culture, and business goals. Known for turning complex challenges into clear narratives and actionable strategies.  
  
With a significant background in content, I bring a creative lens to every project, balancing big-picture thinking with attention to detail.

name: Yousif Al-homoudi
classification_reason: Profile shows technical/engineering focus in airport operations and permits management, not support/IT/customer success operations. Role involves facilities maintenance, project management, and technical permits rather than ticket-based support workflows, agent management, or knowledge retention challenges. Company appears to be a large airport authority rather than a 50-1,500 employee B2B/SaaS company with scaling support operations.

talking_points: Customer success leadership and post-sales expertise
Experience driving customer and employee satisfaction
Background in B2B SaaS environment at Connectbase
Strong community involvement in youth sports coaching
Educational background from Bryant University
Extensive professional network with 2K+ followers and 500+ connections
pain_points: Managing customer success metrics and retention in competitive SaaS market
Scaling customer success operations as company grows
Balancing post-sales support with proactive customer engagement
Team management and employee satisfaction in remote/hybrid environments
Driving customer adoption and reducing churn rates
Integrating customer feedback into product development cycles
analysis.outreach_approach: Start with a value-driven email focusing on customer success best practices, referencing his role at Connectbase and shared industry challenges. Position your solution as complementary to his customer satisfaction goals. Follow up with a LinkedIn connection request mentioning mutual interests in customer success leadership.
personalization: Reference his VP of Customer Success role at Connectbase specifically
Mention his focus on driving customer and employee satisfaction from his LinkedIn about section
Note his extensive coaching background in youth sports as a leadership parallel
Connect to the Greater Boston area location
Acknowledge his Bryant University education if relevant to your solution
